item.title: Kathy add a quote by Anton Pavlovich Chekhov
item.description: "We shall find peace. We shall hear angels, we shall see the sky sparkling with diamonds." -- Anton Pavlovich Chekhov

item.title: Kathy add a quote by Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
item.description: "Silently, one by one, in the infinite meadows of heaven, Blossomed the lovely stars, the forget-me-nots of the angels." -- Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

item.title: Kathy add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Now cracks a noble heart. Good-night, sweet prince; And flights of angels sing thee to thy rest. " -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Kathy add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "All that I am or ever hope to be, I owe to my angel mother." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Kathy add a quote by Price Collier
item.description: "There is a very great difference — is there not? — between the temporal and the eternal judgments, a very great difference between a man's reputation and a man's character, for reputation is what men think and say of us, while character is what God and the angels know of us." -- Price Collier

item.title: Kathy add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Be not afraid of greatness. Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and others have greatness thrust upon them." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Kathy add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind, And therefore is winged Cupid painted blind." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Kathy add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "If music be the food of love, play on, Give me excess of it; that surfeiting, The appetite may sicken, and so die." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Kathy add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Kathy add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Brevity is the soul of wit." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Kathy add a quote by Dali Lama
item.description: "World peace must develop from inner peace. Peace is not just mere absence of violence. Peace is, I think, the manifestation of human compassion." -- Dali Lama

item.title: Kathy add a quote by Dali Lama
item.description: "Remember that the best relationship is one in which your love for each other exceeds your need for each other." -- Dali Lama

item.title: Kathy add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Kathy add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Kathy add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Kathy add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Everything must be made as simple as possible. But not simpler." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Kathy add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If I were not a physicist, I would probably be a musician. I often think in music. I live my daydreams in music. I see my life in terms of music." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Kathy add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity" -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Kathy add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Coincidence is God's way of remaining anonymous." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Kathy add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value." -- Albert Einstein
